title: Game of Thrones - A Telltale Games Series
notes: Nice Performance, no errors, no workarounds needed

title: Game of Thrones - A Telltale Games Series
notes: Game launched in unfocused window at low resolution. Changing it to fullscreen and changing the resolution in the settings menu caused the game to unfocus again. Alt-tabbing back to it worked fine. Audio and video played very smooth without any hitching. However, the game was unplayable because it does not confine the mouse to the game window or to the main screen, so I ended up clicking on my second monitor a good amount of the time during interactive sequences. Restarting the game and playing with only one monitor on was a great experience, though.

title: Game of Thrones - A Telltale Games Series
